org.digijava.kernel.validation

Class TranslatedValueContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.digijava.kernel.validation.TranslatedValueContext
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContentTranslatedValueContext, EditorTranslatedValueContext, MultilingualTranslatedValueContext, NotTranslatedValueContext

    public abstract class TranslatedValueContext
extends java.lang.Object
    A context object that allows to retrieve the value for a specific language.
